languages.text: "Я впечатлен вашей осмотрительностью. То, что вы решили прибыть на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g} инкогнито и пока не объявлять ни о гибели предыдущего {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}, ни о своем статусе — весьма мудро. Слухи рано или поздно поползут — невозможно удержать в тайне то, что знает целый пустотный корабль с тысячами людей на борту. Но пока что вы можете пользоваться преимуществами анонимности".

traits.locale_text: "Я впечатлен вашей осмотрительностью. То, что вы решили прибыть на Футфол инкогнито и пока не объявлять ни о гибели предыдущего Вольного Торговца, ни о своем статусе — весьма мудро. Слухи рано или поздно поползут — невозможно удержать в тайне то, что знает целый корабль с тысячами людей на борту. Но пока что вы можете пользоваться преимуществами анонимности".

languages.text: "I am impressed by your prudence. Your decision to arrive on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} incognito without announcing either the death of the previous {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} or your own status — it was quite wise. The rumours will spread sooner or later — it's impossible to keep secret something that's known to the thousands of people serving on a voidship. But for now, you are free to reap the benefits of anonymity."
languages.original_text: "Я впечатлен вашей осмотрительностью. То, что вы решили прибыть на {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g} инкогнито и пока не объявлять ни о гибели предыдущего {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}, ни о своем статусе — весьма мудро. Слухи рано или поздно поползут — невозможно удержать в тайне то, что знает целый пустотный корабль с тысячами людей на борту. Но пока что вы можете пользоваться преимуществами анонимности".

traits.locale_text: "I am impressed by your prudence. Your decision to arrive on Footfall incognito without announcing neither the death of the previous Rogue Trader nor your own status — it was quite wise. The rumors will spread sooner or later — it's impossible to withhold something that's known to a ship with thousands of people on board. But for now, you are free to reap the benefits of anonymity."

languages.text: 「その慎重さには恐れ入ったよ。前{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の死と君の身分を公表せずに、お忍びで{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}に到着するとは…非常に賢明な判断だ。噂は遅かれ早かれ広まるだろう。ヴォイドシップで働く何千人もの労働者が知ることを秘密にしておくなどできない。しかし今は、身分を隠して得られるメリットを自由に享受できるさ」
languages.original_text: "I am impressed by your prudence. Your decision to arrive on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} incognito without announcing either the death of the previous {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} or your own status — it was quite wise. The rumours will spread sooner or later — it's impossible to keep secret something that's known to the thousands of people serving on a voidship. But for now, you are free to reap the benefits of anonymity."

traits.locale_text: 「その慎重さには恐れ入ったよ。前{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の死と君の身分を公表せずに、お忍びで{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}に到着するとは…非常に賢明な判断だ。噂は遅かれ早かれ広まるだろう。ヴォイドシップで働く何千人もの労働者が知ることを秘密にしておくなどできない。しかし今は、身分を隠して得られるメリットを自由に享受できるさ」

languages.text: “您的谨慎给我留下了深刻的印象。您决定隐姓埋名到达{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}，既没有公布之前{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}身亡的消息，也没有宣布您的身份，这非常明智。不过，流言迟早会传播开来，因为整整一艘飞船的人都知道这件事情，想要一直保密是不可能的。不过现在，您可以自由享受隐姓埋名所带来的益处。”
languages.original_text: "I am impressed by your prudence. Your decision to arrive on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} incognito without announcing either the death of the previous {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} or your own status — it was quite wise. The rumours will spread sooner or later — it's impossible to keep secret something that's known to the thousands of people serving on a voidship. But for now, you are free to reap the benefits of anonymity."

traits.locale_text: “您的谨慎给我留下了深刻的印象。您决定隐姓埋名到达{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}，既没有公布之前{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}身亡的消息，也没有宣布您的身份，这非常明智。不过，流言迟早会传播开来，因为整整一艘飞船的人都知道这件事情，想要一直保密是不可能的。不过现在，您可以自由享受隐姓埋名所带来的益处。”

languages.text: «Su prudencia me deja atónito. Que haya decidido arribar de incógnito a {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}, sin anunciar la muerte de la anterior {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} ni su propio título... ha sido muy acertado. Los rumores correrán tarde o temprano; es imposible mantener en secreto algo que conocen los miles de personas que trabajan en una nave del vacío. En fin, de momento, benefíciese del anonimato».
languages.original_text: "I am impressed by your prudence. Your decision to arrive on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} incognito without announcing either the death of the previous {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} or your own status — it was quite wise. The rumours will spread sooner or later — it's impossible to keep secret something that's known to the thousands of people serving on a voidship. But for now, you are free to reap the benefits of anonymity."

traits.locale_text: «Su prudencia me deja atónito. Que haya decidido arribar de incógnito a {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}, sin anunciar la muerte de la anterior {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} ni su propio título... ha sido muy acertado. Los rumores correrán tarde o temprano; es imposible mantener en secreto algo que conocen los miles de personas que trabajan en una nave del vacío. En fin, de momento, benefíciese del anonimato».

languages.text: « Votre prudence m'impressionne. Il était sage de votre part de débarquer à {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g} incognito sans annoncer ni la mort de la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g} ni votre propre statut. Les rumeurs finiront bien par se propager ; on ne garde pas longtemps secrète une information connue des milliers de personnes servant à bord d'un vaisseau. Mais en attendant ce moment, vous pouvez profiter de tous les avantages de l'anonymat. »
languages.original_text: "I am impressed by your prudence. Your decision to arrive on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} incognito without announcing either the death of the previous {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} or your own status — it was quite wise. The rumours will spread sooner or later — it's impossible to keep secret something that's known to the thousands of people serving on a voidship. But for now, you are free to reap the benefits of anonymity."

traits.locale_text: « Votre prudence m'impressionne. Il était sage de votre part de débarquer à {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g} incognito sans annoncer ni la mort de la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g} ni votre propre statut. Les rumeurs finiront bien par se propager ; on ne garde pas longtemps secrète une information connue des milliers de personnes servant à bord d'un vaisseau. Mais en attendant ce moment, vous pouvez profiter de tous les avantages de l'anonymat. »

languages.text: "Eure Umsicht beeindruckt mich. Eure Entscheidung, inkognito auf {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} einzutreffen und weder den Tod der vorigen {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} noch Euren eigenen Status bekannt zu geben – das war sehr klug. Die Gerüchte kommen früher oder später ohnehin – niemand kann etwas geheim halten, das Tausende, die auf einem Raumschiff dienen, bereits wissen. Aber für den Moment könnt Ihr die Vorteile der Anonymität nutzen."
languages.original_text: "I am impressed by your prudence. Your decision to arrive on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} incognito without announcing either the death of the previous {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} or your own status — it was quite wise. The rumours will spread sooner or later — it's impossible to keep secret something that's known to the thousands of people serving on a voidship. But for now, you are free to reap the benefits of anonymity."

Aber für den Moment könnt Ihr die Vorteile der Anonymität nutzen."

languages.text: "İhtiyatlılığınızdan etkilendim doğrusu. Önceki {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'in{/g} vefatını veya kendi mevkinizi duyurmadan {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman'a{/g} tebdilikıyafet gelme kararınız oldukça akıllıcaydı. Gerçi söylentiler er geç yayılacaktır. Neticede uçsuz gemisinde hizmet veren binlerce insanın bildiği bir şeyi sır olarak saklamak imkânsızdır. Lakin şimdilik anonimliğin avantajlarından gönlünüzce yararlanabilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "I am impressed by your prudence. Your decision to arrive on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} incognito without announcing either the death of the previous {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} or your own status — it was quite wise. The rumours will spread sooner or later — it's impossible to keep secret something that's known to the thousands of people serving on a voidship. But for now, you are free to reap the benefits of anonymity."

traits.locale_text: "Sağduyunuzdan etkilendim. Önceki {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'in ölümünü veya kendi mevkinizi duyurmadan {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g}'a tebdilikıyafet gelme kararınız oldukça akıllıcaydı. Söylentiler er ya da geç yayılacak, uçsuz gemisinde hizmet veren binlerce insanın bildiği bir şeyi sır olarak saklamak imkânsız. Ancak şimdilik, anonimliğin avantajlarından yararlanmakta özgürsünüz."
